statements: SELECT * FROM fuel_tracking;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type FROM fuel_tracking;
SELECT fuel_type, fuel_consumed FROM fuel_tracking WHERE fuel_consumed > 10;
SELECT vehicle_id, distance_traveled, efficiency_rating FROM fuel_tracking WHERE efficiency_rating >= 3.5 ORDER BY distance_traveled DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, distance_traveled, efficiency_rating FROM fuel_tracking WHERE fuel_type = 'Diesel' ORDER BY efficiency_rating ASC, distance_traveled DESC;
SELECT * FROM fuel_tracking ORDER BY fuel_consumed DESC, distance_traveled ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, fuel_consumed FROM fuel_tracking WHERE fuel_type='Diesel' ORDER BY distance_traveled DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_consumed, efficiency_rating FROM fuel_tracking WHERE distance_traveled > 1000 AND efficiency_rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY distance_traveled ASC;
SELECT * FROM fuel_tracking WHERE vehicle_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY fuel_type ASC, efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT MAX(fuel_consumed) AS max_fuel_consumed, MIN(fuel_consumed) AS min_fuel_consumed FROM fuel_tracking;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption ORDER BY fuel_type DESC;
SELECT SUM(distance_traveled) AS total_distance FROM fuel_consumption;
SELECT * FROM efficiency_metrics WHERE cost_per_mile <= 0.10;
SELECT vehicle_id, efficiency_rating FROM efficiency_metrics WHERE fuel_efficiency > 25.0;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption WHERE fuel_type = 'Gasoline'
SELECT vehicle_id, distance_traveled, fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption WHERE date_recorded > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM efficiency_metrics WHERE cost_per_mile < 0.10 ORDER BY fuel_efficiency DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, cost_per_mile FROM efficiency_metrics WHERE efficiency_rating = 'Good'
SELECT SUM(fuel_consumed) AS total_fuel_consumed, AVG(distance_traveled) AS avg_distance_traveled FROM fuel_consumption
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption;
SELECT id, vehicle_id, fuel_type FROM fuel_consumption ORDER BY fuel_type DESC;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year >= 2010;
SELECT id, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_cost > 500 ORDER BY maintenance_cost;
SELECT vehicle_id, distance_traveled, efficiency FROM fuel_consumption WHERE distance_traveled > 1000;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption WHERE fuel_type = 'Diesel';
SELECT id, distance_traveled FROM fuel_consumption WHERE vehicle_id = '1234';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT vehicle_id) FROM fuel_consumption;
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(fuel_consumed) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING total_fuel_consumed > 50;
SELECT vehicles.make, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance_logs FROM vehicles JOIN maintenance_logs ON vehicles.id = maintenance_logs.vehicle_id GROUP BY vehicles.make ORDER BY total_maintenance_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, distance_travelled FROM fuel_consumption WHERE efficiency > 10;
SELECT vehicle_name, manufacture_year FROM vehicles ORDER BY manufacture_year DESC;
SELECT station_name, location, fuel_type_available FROM fuel_stations WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT fuel_type, SUM(fuel_consumed) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption GROUP BY fuel_type
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV' ORDER BY vehicle_name ASC
SELECT station_name, location FROM fuel_stations WHERE location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT fuel_type, cost_per_liter, date_updated FROM fuel_costs WHERE cost_per_liter > 2.5
SELECT * FROM fuel_log;
SELECT log_id, fuel_amount, distance_traveled FROM fuel_log;
SELECT vehicle_id, AVG(fuel_efficiency) AS avg_efficiency FROM fuel_log GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(vehicle_id) AS vehicle_count FROM vehicles GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT * FROM fuel_log WHERE fuel_amount > 50 ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(fuel_amount) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM fuel_log GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING total_fuel_consumed > 200 ORDER BY total_fuel_consumed DESC;
SELECT driver_name, driving_experience, manufacturer FROM drivers JOIN vehicles ON drivers.driver_id = vehicles.vehicle_id ORDER BY driving_experience ASC, manufacturer DESC;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance_travelled FROM trips WHERE distance_travelled BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY distance_travelled DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT station_name, station_type FROM fuel_stations WHERE station_type = 'Gas' ORDER BY station_name ASC LIMIT 5;
